
---
title: '邦克仕推出 iPhone 12 _ Pro MagSafe 背夹电池：5000mAh，售价 165 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/7/c38e3391-a9f4-40cf-84c5-6970ba0dc776.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sun, 18 Jul 2021 08:53:20 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/7/c38e3391-a9f4-40cf-84c5-6970ba0dc776.png'
---

<div>   
<p><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 7 月 18 日消息 苹果于 7 月 14 日发布了自家的首款 MagSafe 外接电池，换算后容量 2920mAh，售价 749 元。该产品可以支持有线 15W 以及无线方式为 <a class="s_tag" href="https://iphone.ithome.com/" target="_blank">iPhone 12</a> / Pro 系列手机充电，但是无线充电功率未知，预计为 5W。</p><p>近日国内厂商邦克仕推出了自家的 MagSafe 磁吸背夹电池，外形类似苹果自家的产品，但电池容量为 <span class="accentTextColor">5000mAh</span>，同样兼容有线/无线方式。官方表示，产品可以提供 5W 无线充电 + 12W 有线充电。</p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/7/c38e3391-a9f4-40cf-84c5-6970ba0dc776.png" w="865" h="742" title="邦克仕推出 iPhone 12 / Pro MagSafe 背夹电池：5000mAh，售价 165 元" width="865" height="703" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/7/6f9ed462-1623-4821-a6ae-1b142667ce64.png" w="864" h="958" title="邦克仕推出 iPhone 12 / Pro MagSafe 背夹电池：5000mAh，售价 165 元" width="864" height="909" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p>这款产品厚度为 12.5mm，采用 PC + 液态硅胶材质，产品型号为 MP01。背夹电池具有一个 Type-C 接口，支持 18W 充电输入</p><p><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/7/f7b8d729-33b5-4a42-943a-5dc3f86b6a42.png" w="867" h="905" title="邦克仕推出 iPhone 12 / Pro MagSafe 背夹电池：5000mAh，售价 165 元" width="867" height="856" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p>IT之家了解到，邦克仕这款磁吸充电宝提供石墨黑、海军蓝、珍珠白三种配色，目前售价 165 元。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380" data-jdid="10029838336327"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/187304/3/4668/403329/60b0bb4fE1167c280/00d41c6f9f3bda6a.jpg" title="邦克仕推出 iPhone 12 / Pro MagSafe 背夹电池：5000mAh，售价 165 元" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">邦克仕磁吸充电宝 MagSafe</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">165 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
